1.label: Temperature/ Humidity report interval
1.description: Used to adjust the time between report interval for Temperature and humidity in seconds. Min is 30, max is 32767 and default is 900

2.label: Report temperature on change
2.description: Temperature delta value. Value 0: Reporting temperature based on change is disabled. Value: + 0.5 to + 5°C (Default 10)

options.label: Temperature reporting on change is disabled

3.label: Report humidity on change
3.description: Humidity delta value. Value 0 : Reporting Humidity based on change is disabled. Value: 5 to 50% (Default 10%)

options.label: Humidity reporting on change is disabled

8.label: LED maximum brightness
8.description: Adjust the backlight of LCD display.

9.label: LED display timeout
9.description: Set the time after which the LED display will be active after after being activated (Default 3, 3 seconds)

10.label: Temperature Control Hysteresis
10.description: Set the delta value for the thermostat to turn on/off heating. Value 0.3 to 3°C (Default 5, 0,5°C)

11.label: Minimum Temperature Limit
11.description: Set the minimum temperature limit. Value 5 to 40°C (Default 50, 5°C)

12.label: Maximum Temperature Limit
12.description: Set the maximum temperature limit. Value 5 to 40°C (Default 400, 40°C)

13.label: External Relay and Operating State update interval
13.description: Set time on how often the devices sends Binary Switch State and thermostat mode. Value 0: Sends only when changed (Default). 1 to 240 minutes + When changed

options.label: Send Relay and Operating State only when changed

14.label: Report when presence is detected
14.description: Decides if the thermostat sends temperature when presence is detected.

options.label: Do NOT send report when presence is detected. Only at the defined interval
Send report when presence is detected.
